contentfulPagePressRelease.title: QF’s Academic Bridge Program Hosts HBKU Partner Universities

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation’s Academic Bridge Program (ABP) recently hosted a college fair and information session entitled ‘HBKU Partner Universities—A Closer Look.’

Representatives from Virginia Commonwealth University in Qatar, Weill Cornell Medical College in Qatar, Texas A&M University at Qatar, Carnegie Mellon University in Qatar, Georgetown University - School of Foreign Service in Qatar, and Northwestern University in Qatar were on hand to answer questions from ABP students and provide them with first-hand information about their respective admissions requirements.

ABP students also had the opportunity to learn more about HBKU’s Student Services division and the courses offered at the six HBKU Partner universities.

The ABP is the largest ‘feeder school’ to the HBKU partner universities and has enjoyed a very special relationship with these universities.

For the full story, please click here.
